section.title: Setting up the Thales Simulator
section.para: In this exercise, you will download, install and run the Thales Simulator on a Windows machine.

db:orderedlist.title: Download and Install the Thales Simulator

listitem.para: Unzip the downloaded file and execute the file ThalesWinSimulatorSetup.msi, accepting the default options.
Navigate to the folder where you installed the Simulator (E.g. C:\Program Files (x86)\NTG\Thales Simulator)
Execute ThalesWinSimulator.exe (if your are running Windows 7, right click the file and select Run As Administrator)
Click the Start Simulator button. TODO: insert image.

In the Application Events window, the simulator will inform you that it could not find a file containing the LMK keys so it will create a new set of keys for you. When the simulator creates new keys in this manner, the same keys will always be created. TODO: insert image.
